snippet: Beyond being segregated from other prisoners, Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, who is charged with helping carry out the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing, may well spend little time outside his cell, period.
abstract: Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, who is charged with helping carry out the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing, is segregated from other prisoners at secure federal medical facility in Devens, Mass, while awaiting trial in November; he spends little time outside his cell and receives few visitors.

byline.original: By MICHAEL WINES and SERGE F. KOVALESKI
byline.contributor: Susan C. Beachy and Alain Delaquérière contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Beyond being segregated from other prisoners, Dzhokhar Tsarnaev, who is charged with helping carry out the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing, may well spend little time outside his cell, period.

headline.main: Marathon Bombing Suspect Waits in Isolation
headline.print_headline: Marathon Bombing Suspect Waits in Isolation
